Description: [PATCH] Kconfig i18n support
[PATCH] kconfig: trivial cleanup
[PATCH] kconfig: simplify symbol type parsing
[PATCH] kconfig: Fix Kconfig performance bug
[PATCH] kconfig: fix restart for choice symbols
[PATCH] kconfig: allow variable argumnts for range
Notes: It could be classified as refactoring, but new functions sym_get_range_val and sym_validate_range enables a semantic change. If a symbols value falls outside its range Kconfig now adjust the value to valid range boundary. Its backwards compatible

Description: [PATCH] kconfig: use gperf for kconfig keywords
[PATCH] kconfig: improve error handling in the parser
kbuild: create .kernelrelease at *config step
kconfig: allow multiple default values per symbol
kconfig: allow loading multiple configurations
Notes: existing Kconfig files should parse, the way their values are stored and potentially interact with other configuration layers  is altered

Description: kconfig: create links in info window
kconfig: remove SYMBOL_{YES
kconfig: warn about leading whitespace for menu prompts
kconfig: add symbol option config syntax
Notes: Existing Kconfig files using option are unaffected, as they already conform to this syntax.  v2.6.17-rc6-12-gf6a88aa86027

Description: kconfig: add defconfig_list/module option
Notes: introduces new Kconfig behavior by allowing the symbol representing module support (option modules)

Description: [PATCH] kconfig: make sym_change_count static
kconfig: correct minor typo in Kconfig warning message.
kconfig: fix mconf segmentation fault
kconfig: error out if recursive dependencies are found
kconfig: attach help text to menus
Notes: Doesn’t change core syntax, but improves how help info is structured

Description: kconfig: syntax cleanup - drop support for "depends/requires/def_boolean"
Notes: removes support for the redundant Kconfig keywords requires, depends (without on), and def_boolean/def_bool. It simplifies the language syntax. Breaks backward compatibility. v2.6.23-2289-g247537b9a270

Description: kconfig: tristate choices with mixed tristate and boolean values
Notes: Improves the semantics of choice blocks by supporting mixed bool and tristate entries.

Description: Revert "kconfig: tristate choices with mixed tristate and boolean values"
Notes: The previously added logic for mixed bool and tristate choices (a5bf3d891a6a) caused real regressions: it broke valid configuration

Description: kconfig: rename E_OR & friends to avoid name clash
kconfig: macro fix in menu.c
Notes: it simplifies how prompts are handled internally, clear internal cleanup

Description: kconfig: whitespace removing
kconfig: explicitly introduce expression list
kconfig: use environment option
kconfig: environment symbol support
Notes: In V2.6.24 ARCH and KERNELVERSION are hard coded in Kconfig files. It can bring compatibility problems

Description: kconfig: tristate choices with mixed tristate and boolean values
Notes: an issue where tristate choices containing both bool and tristate members did not behave intuitively. Affects the behavior of tristate choices containing boolean members.

Description: kconfig: ignore select of unknown symbol
Notes: Now, select on an undefined symbol is silently ignored before it was giving errors. Its still a semantic change

Description: kconfig: fix select in combination with default
Notes: the commit changes sym_calc_value() function because of an error which is reported. Its a semantic chage to value calculation

Description: kconfig: fix choice dependency check
Notes: This commit refactors and improves the recursive dependency checking logic (sym_check_deps). It is backward compatible

Description: kconfig: add named choice group
Notes: slightly changes the choice type logic. Compatible with existing Kconfig files not using the new named choice feature

First Konfig implementation
modification of how string literals are parsed.(processing unescaped newlines).
There are new rules in lexer which altering how input tokenized. New grammar rules in parser. In symbol.c changes potentially influencing Kconfig Uis.
new keyword menuconfig and token T_MENUCONFIG, new grammar rules to parse menuconfig statements.
Major change. new keywords (def_tristate, def_bool/def_boolean, select/enable, range). Symbol value calculation is rewritten. Zconf.y addition of dependency cycle check
In symbol.c changes alters how a symbols visibility and final value are determined. In expr new optimization rule added.
New functionality added in symbol.c, searching for Kconfig symbols. Probably usefull for Kconfig Uis
